name: circle-of-hell
description: The hottest fixed time fatazz in the world! Circle of Hell Race website with hellish animations and effects.

scripts.dev: echo "ğŸ”¥ Starting Circle of Hell dev server..." && echo "ğŸ“± Network URL: http://$(ipconfig getifaddr en0 || ifconfig | grep 'inet ' | grep -v 127.0.0.1 | awk '{print $2}' | head -1):8000" && echo "ğŸ’» Local URL: http://localhost:8000" && echo "" && python3 -m http.server 8000
scripts.ip: echo "ğŸ“± Your network IP: $(ipconfig getifaddr en0 || ifconfig | grep 'inet ' | grep -v 127.0.0.1 | awk '{print $2}' | head -1)" && echo "ğŸŒ Network URL: http://$(ipconfig getifaddr en0 || ifconfig | grep 'inet ' | grep -v 127.0.0.1 | awk '{print $2}' | head -1):8000"
scripts.stop: lsof -ti:8000 | xargs kill -9 || echo 'No server running on port 8000'
scripts.build: echo "âœ… Static site - no build needed! Deploy the entire directory to your web server."

author: Jeffrey Ruoss
